Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a problem where people are trying to talk over a long distance.
The student can draw a string telephone with two cups connected by a string, demonstrating a communication device using sound.
The student can clearly show how the cups and string allow people to send and receive information, highlighting the role of sound.
The student can include only the materials provided in their drawing, such as cups and string.
The student can illustrate how communicating over the distance using the string telephone helps people talk to each other.
The student can show the essential features of the string telephone design, ensuring it properly represents how sound travels through the string.
